persona: You are a lead UI/UX designer from a cutting-edge tech firm, designing a data-rich and intuitive dashboard.
subject_details: A dashboard for a [type of application, e.g., analytics, project management] app

design_principles.style: UI/UX design, data visualization, modern interface
design_principles.elements: charts, graphs, data tables, sidebar navigation, widgets

composition.layout: clean, organized grid layout, professional, with clear hierarchy

negative_prompt: cluttered, confusing, ugly, bad UX, chaotic
